Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: cash paid on redeemable preferred securities of subsidiary
proceeds from payments to minority shareholders
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt maturing in three months or less
Repayment of Debt: repayments of mandatory redeemable capital securities
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from collection of notes receivable
proceeds from sale of productive assets
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase including exchange rate effect

Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: business combination step acquisition equity interest in acquiree remeasurement gain
chargefor venezuelan balance sheet remeasurementand deconsolidation
gain loss on disposition of assets1
income loss from equity method investments net of dividends or distributions
other operating activities cash flow statement
pension and other postretirement benefit expense
